SCP 0.1.2
  • Reference

    ExpHeatmapPlot

    ExpHeatmapPlot.Rd

    ExpHeatmapPlot

    Usage

    ExpHeatmapPlot(
  srt,
  genes = NULL,
  gene_groups = NULL,
  cluster_genes = TRUE,
  cell_group_by = "orig.ident",
  cluster_cells = TRUE,
  max_cells = 100,
  slot = "counts",
  assay = "RNA",
  exp_method = c("zscore", "raw", "log2fc", "log1p"),
  lib_normalize = FALSE,
  lib_size = NULL,
  use_raster = NULL,
  heatmap_palette = "RdBu",
  gene_palette = "Paired",
  cell_palette = "Paired"
)

    Arguments

    srt

    A Seurat object.

    genes

    A vector of gene names to plot.

    gene_groups

    A vector of group names for genes.

    cell_group_by

    Columns used to calculate cell expression. One heatmap per column name.

    assay

    Assay used to calculate the expression.

    exp_method

    Method used to calculate cell expression.

    heatmap_palette

    Heatmap expression palette.

    gene_palette

    Gene group palette.

    cell_palette

    Column palette.

    ncell_sample

    Number of cells used to sample representative cell populations.

    Examples

    library(dplyr)
data(pancreas1k)
pancreas1k <- RunDEtest(pancreas1k, group_by = "SubCellType")
#> [2022-06-10 16:14:20] Start DEtest
#> Threads used for DE test: 124
#> Perform FindAllMarkers(wilcox)...
#> 
  |                                                                  
  |                                                            |   0%
  |                                                                  
  |========                                                    |  12%
  |                                                                  
  |===============                                             |  25%
  |                                                                  
  |======================                                      |  38%
  |                                                                  
  |==============================                              |  50%
  |                                                                  
  |======================================                      |  62%
  |                                                                  
  |=============================================               |  75%
  |                                                                  
  |====================================================        |  88%
  |                                                                  
  |============================================================| 100%
#> 
#> [2022-06-10 16:14:34] DEtest done
#> Elapsed time: 14.21 secs 
de_filter <- filter(pancreas1k@tools$DEtest_CellType$AllMarkers_wilcox, p_val_adj < 0.01 & avg_log2FC > 1)
ExpHeatmapPlot(srt = pancreas1k, genes = de_filter$gene, gene_groups = de_filter$group1, cell_group_by = "CellType")
